name: Froggo (itch) (mochi_works)
description:
Froggo!!

One evening a small little Frog got lost from his family help hop your way across the lake to make it back before sunset and it is too late....

Created for Mini Jam and made in under 24 hours!

Credits:

Art and Development: Lucy Bradbury (Me!)

Music: Music: “Magical Sun”, from PlayOnLoop.com
